scenes.description: Merchandise showcase for Fuwawa and Mococo's birthday, featuring plushies, finger puppets, ASMR voice packs, and full birthday sets.
Fuwawa and Mococo interact with the audience on stage, discussing their merch and teasing the arrival of a mystery guest.
The mystery guest, Kuro-chan from Yasuda Dai Circus, makes a grand entrance and attempts a humorous self-introduction in both Japanese and broken English.
